Segment.name: DAD
Segment.comment: To provide detail information about the debit authorization

Field.name: TransactionHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code designating the action to be taken by all parties

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: OriginatingCompanyIdentifier
Field.comment: A unique identifier designating the company initiating the funds transfer instructions. The first character is one-digit ANSI identification code designation (ICD) followed by the nine-digit identification number which may be an IRS employer identification number (EIN), data universal numbering system (DUNS), or a user assigned number; the ICD for an EIN is 1, DUNS is 3, user assigned number is 9

Field.name: OriginatingCompanySupplementalCode
Field.comment: A code defined between the originating company and the originating depository financial institution (ODFI) that uniquely identifies the company initiating the transfer instructions

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: DFIIdNumberQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of identification number of Depository Financial Institution (DFI)

Field.name: FrequencyCode
Field.comment: Code indicating frequency or type of activities or actions being reported
